posts.post_content:
Posted this yesterday an the wrong thread so I'll get it right today...

Asking prices:

Ty Cobb Bat Off Shoulder PSA 1 -$3,450
Ty Cobb Bat On Shoulder PSA 1 - SOLD

Prices are net of any fees and can accept payment in many different ways.  Price also includes registered mail shipping.  I'm happy to ship another way but won't be responsible for any issues after it's shipped (sorry, but if you want it faster, the shipping risk is yours).  

Happy to accept trades in full or in part for t206 PSA 2 needs I have as well as any PSA 5 or better t206 upgrades.  

PM if you'd like to discuss.

Thanks!
